text: We usually get the vertices of a cube with bit operations on their index (Hamming). But doing something similar for edges is tricky. Here I use a 30 bit LUT, which isn't satisfying (ðŸ§µ): https://t.co/z2ALVxi9EM

We usually get the vertices of a cube with bit operations on their index (Hamming). But doing something similar for edges is tricky. Here I use a 30 bit LUT, which isn't satisfying (ðŸ§µ): https://t.co/z2ALVxi9EM
